titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: A QUESTION OF THE PRIVILEGES OF THE HOUSE - Ms. Fudge rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted a privileged resolution. Upon examination of the resolution, the Chair determined that the resolution qualified.
Mr. Cantor moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 186, 10 Present (Roll no. 107).

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 3/6/2014--Introduced. Condemns the offensive and disrespectful manner in which Chairman Darrell E. Issa conducted the hearing of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform on March 5, 2014, during which he turned off the microphones of the Ranking Member while he was speaking and adjourned the hearing without a vote or a unanimous consent agreement.
